changeSet.author: equipment
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE users ( usr_pcode bigserial, usr_login varchar(50) NOT NULL UNIQUE, usr_password varchar(255) NOT NULL, usr_fullname varchar(128) NOT NULL, usr_phone varchar(128) NOT NULL, usr_email varchar(255) NOT NULL, usr_role varchar(50) NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT users_pk PRIMARY KEY(usr_pcode));

changeSet.author: equipment
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE vendors ( vnd_pcode bigserial, vnd_name varchar(255) NOT NULL, vnd_site varchar(1024), CONSTRAINT vendors_pk PRIMARY KEY(vnd_pcode));

changeSet.author: equipment
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE categories ( cat_pcode bigserial, cat_name varchar(255) NOT NULL, cat_description varchar(1024), CONSTRAINT categories_pk PRIMARY KEY(cat_pcode));
